title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 303.2 - Additional liability under increased ordinary death benefit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 303.2 - Additional liability under increased ordinary death benefit

State Regulations

The additional liability on account of past member service
and prior service of members of the system shall be liquidated by extending the
period over which the deficiency contributions would otherwise be payable, and
to continue until such liability shall have been fully paid, as certified by
the chief actuary of the system. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
303.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
